name: scroll_down_multi
description: CSI 2 T scrolls down by 2 lines
comment: Print A at (0,0), B at (1,0), C at (2,0), D at (3,0) cursor->(3,1). CSI 2 T scrolls down 2 lines. C and D scroll off bottom. A->(2,0), B->(3,0). Cursor stays at (3,1). X printed at (3,1) overwriting B's col 1, cursor->(3,2).
